name: Truth Or Dare (vls_sergey_vls)
description:
Game Truth or Dare.

An exciting game that will help you get to know your

friends or soul mate! Many categories of questions will not let you

feel bored.

Questions.

There are hundreds of exciting questions waiting for you in the game.

Couples questions, party questions, hot questions and more!

For the first connection you will need internet, because

questions are downloaded from the server.

Rules of the game.

The rules are very simple. All players in a circle choose a card,

truth or dare. If the player chose the truth, then he honestly answers

to the question that he saw on the card, if the player chose an action,

then he must fulfill what is written on the card.

This game will be interesting for both: large groups of friends and

loving couple! Download and enjoy the pleasant truth or dare game!
